mapper.update: update template_all set tempname = #{tempname},tempscope=#{tempscope} where tempid=#{tempid}
mapper.select: (select n.itemcode, itemname, size, price,tempRelid from non_medic n join temprel tr on n.itemcode=tr.itemcode where tempid = #{tempid}) union (select m.itemcode, itemname, size, price,tempRelid from medicine m join temprel tr on m.itemcode=tr.itemcode where tempid = #{tempid})
